entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of rain beginning late this evening except periods of snow over higher terrain. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023
